title: Gangster with a Wand

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Frogging lasts for the next day and night.
- Frogs must say "ribbit" every other message and must react to at least 20 messages with :frog: 
- Frogs cannot hop more than two houses away from them.
- Frogs will appear as "Frog" upon death, and always show up as a Frog to (2467) Frogvestigator.

desc:
Post 671
*Don't mess with the magic stick!*
